description: This file defines a React functional component 'Title' that displays animated title text, utilizing hooks from the 'remotion' library for video rendering effects. It splits the input text into words, applies animated scaling to each word with delay, and styles the heading.

methods.name: Title
methods.description: React functional component that renders animated title text based on provided 'titleText' and 'titleColor' props, applying spring animation effects to each word.
